Package assets

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttachmentListCell
    This is a class for list view cell with a file attachment
    AttachmentListCellNonRemoveable<MyFile>
    Extends attachmentListCell Same concept but without remove button This is a list cell that holds an item of object MyFile It will display on the left side the image that represents the file And on the right the file name (file.ext)
    EmailTLS  
    MessagesCreator  
    SqlAction
    This class is used to send sql queries to the database.
    SqlFileAction
    Extends the SqlAction class Used for upload / download of files to/from server.
    SqlResult
    This class is used to hold the result set from the server Used inorder to remove dependices on sql server connection
    Toast
    This class serves the same purpose as android toast object makeText shows a small window for a predetermined amount of time
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ProjectPages
    Enum that represents all our project boundries
    SqlQueryType  
    SqlQueryType.SqlExecutionType  
    StepType
    Enum that represents all our project different steps during that change request handling process
